name: Unity Ave
description:
Welcome to Unity Ave! My first game. Ever!
This is a 2.5D sidescroller action adventure game where you follow the story of Hue and his roommate Clive, who aspire to become Epic Heroes. Trying to make ends meet and make a name for themselves in the Sirus City, they moved to a rough neighborhood on Unity Avenue and soon find themselves getting involved in situations that will change their lives forever.

Unity Ave is currently in development.  If you have comments or find any bugs to report, let me know in the comments.

I work during the day, so I can only do game development on my free nights and weekends. 

If you'd like to support development of the project, feel free to donate. Any money donated will applied to the growth of Unity Ave.

Follow the progress
Instagram, Twitter, Reddit

Note: There's no Save Game. Every playthrough will start a new game.
